name: Blue Umbrella Guy
description:
Adventure of a guy who always carries blue umbrella.


This game is created for Game Off 2021.

The theme of the game jam is BUG. We decide to random a word with acronym of a B. U. G, and then we get a title game is Blue Umbrella Guy. XD

Team :

ARIL as Programmer

IRFAN  as Game Designer and Sound Engineer

FANDI as Artist
